info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 2:51PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NORTHERN HERKIMER...HAMILTON... SOUTHERN HERKIMER...NORTHERN WARREN...AND NORTHERN SARATOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 250 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Newcomb to near Northwood and moving east at 55 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Lake Pleasant around 325 PM EST. Wells around 330 PM EST. Sacandaga Campground and Rogers Rock Campground around 335 PM EST. Day Center around 345 PM EST. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 23 and 26. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
